alert.note: Alert for Curry County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 8:05PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CURRY COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM MDT... At 805 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clovis, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Farwell, Texico, Cannon Air Force Base, Ranchvale, Portair, and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 377 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
